keyEvents.title: All Memories Restored Across Island
keyEvents.description: When Noko is defeated, all stolen memories are released like bursts of light spreading across Ruluka Island, restoring everyone's identities.
keyEvents.significance: The resolution of the memory crisis that affected the entire island population.

keyEvents.title: Drim's Reunion
keyEvents.description: Drim reunites with his mother on Ruluka Island after being freed from Noko's control.
keyEvents.significance: Provides emotional closure to one of the arc's subplots.

keyEvents.title: Villagers Attack the Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: The villagers of Ruluka Island, misunderstanding the situation, attack the Straw Hat Pirates believing them to be the memory thieves.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the bittersweet ending where the crew's heroism goes unrecognized.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Depart
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates escape from Ruluka Island on the Waver, departing empty-handed despite saving everyone.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the Ocean's Dream Arc.

description: Ruluka Island is the setting for the Ocean's Dream Arc. The island's inhabitants suffered memory loss due to Noko's memory-stealing abilities. The island features a forest and village, and is home to Drim and his mother.
notable_features: Palace of the Sea God (mentioned in arc)

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Zoro Battle
keyEvents.description: Luffy battles Zoro in the forest while Zoro is still under Noko's hypnotic influence.
keyEvents.significance: Setting for crew-vs-crew conflict caused by Noko's manipulation.

keyEvents.title: Memory Illusions Created
keyEvents.description: Noko creates illusions of past characters from the crew's memories in the forest, using purple smoke.
keyEvents.significance: The forest becomes filled with spectral projections of the crew's past.

keyEvents.title: Noko's Sennenryu Transformation
keyEvents.description: Noko inflates and floats above the forest, declaring himself a Sennenryu after absorbing the crew's memories.
keyEvents.significance: The climactic transformation scene of the arc's antagonist.

keyEvents.title: Final Battle and Noko's Defeat
keyEvents.description: Luffy defeats Noko in the forest, ending the memory theft crisis.
keyEvents.significance: The resolution location for the Ocean's Dream Arc's main conflict.

description: The forest on Ruluka Island served as the primary battleground for the final confrontation with Noko. The crew traveled through this forest searching for the memory thief, and it became the site where Noko revealed his full powers and was ultimately defeated.
